```{r}
library(traveltimeCLT)
library(data.table)
```

```{r}
trips <- fread("data/trips.csv")
set.seed(1234)
id <- sample(unique(trips$trip), 2000)
Rprof("profile.out")
t_5 <- similar_route(id, trips, sigma_n = 0, model = "t", significance = 0.05)
t_5F <- similar_route(id, trips, sigma_n = 0, model = "t", significance = 0.05, Ftest_sd = TRUE)
# similar_route(c(2700,2701), trips,r=5, significance=0.05)
Rprof(NULL)
summaryRprof("profile.out")
# check if s have NAs
any(is.na(t_5F))

write.csv(t_5, "data/similarity_route_t5.csv")
write.csv(t_5F, "data/similarity_route_t5F.csv")
```
